name: Demon's Revenge
blurb: Demon's Revenge is an exciting turn based 2D RPG which relies deeply on story telling and character development.

rewards.reward: Personal thanks from developers and name in Thank You credits and website.

Hi-Res Wallpaper Pack of 5 wallpapers showcasing 3 of the main characters in their own and \r\nthen a group image of all playable/major characters in the other two and any future wallpapers that we create for Demon's Revenge + \r\nprevious reward
Copy of the finished game in digital form + previous rewards.

Create your own NPC! Your NPC can be a shop or inn owner, a vagrant, or just a regular citizen, have a family or not, be in any town you'd like and look however you'd like it to look! + previous rewards

Early Access - Beta Testing Spot for final testing. Developers will listen to your opinions and fix errors, all input from you guys is valid and will be taken into consideration. Copy of game's original soundtrack in digital form+ previous rewards
The Digital Package - In addition to everything in previous rewards, you get the digital book of lore, compilation of all motion comics and videos in game, and alternate palettes for characters!
Physical copy of the game and soundtrack + previous rewards

Physical Limited Edition Copy of the game and creation of a 
sidequest spanning 1 town and its surrounding area (dungeon area). This includes the creation of the questgiving NPC and all other characters or creatures involved in the quest (NPCs do not just disappear when the quest is done, they still have lives to live) along with 1 enemy,  Max size 100x100 pixels. (We can speak through IM or email 
to discuss the sidequest specifics) + previous rewards, excludes 60.00 reward.
Backers will be given a list of 
all towns in the game with their descriptions (Not enough to ruin the game, but enough to make an 
informed decision about where they want their quest to take place) Backers will have credits in the design area as well.

Creation of a sidequest spanning 3 towns and their surrounding areas and design and creation of a boss for the sidequest . This includes the creation of the questgiving NPC and all other characters or creatures involved in the quest (NPCs do not just disappear when the quest is done, they still have lives to live) along with 1 enemy, Max size 200x200 pixels. (We can speak through IM or email \r\nto discuss the sidequest specifics) + previous rewards, excludes 60.00 reward. Backers will have credits in the design area as well.

Create your own dungeon (not necessarily a dungeon, it's all up to your imagination.... But of course within reason) and it's enemies (3 max + boss sized within reason) specifically made for your very own sidequest (or part of the main story if we can fit it in) + previous rewards. Backers will have credits in the design area as well.

Leave the biggest mark by creating and designing your own playable character who will be featured as a secret character in the game. This character will have its own storyline as well as his or her own quest tree to follow. Name your character, design your weapon, outfit, skillset, and anything else you can think of + previous rewards. Backers will have credits in the design area as well.
